COMMENT_TX: $In the collision at the plate, Hartnett suffered an injured leg and had to leave the game. He was badly spiked by Grimm and limped off the field under his own power.
$Grimm actually had singled to CF, but batted out of turn and was called out following Rawlings' AB (see below).

$With Grimm on 1B, Rawlings singled, sending Grimm to 2B. It was after the single that the Cardinals detected Grimm had batted out of turn, and he was called out under the rule by Ump Klem.  Not sure what the official scoring was, but Rawlings remained at 1B. The official batting order given Capt Shotten before the game had Rawlings batting ahead of Grimm. 'The rule covering the case stated that the transgression must be called to the attention of the umpire before the ball is delivered to the succeeding batsman. In the case at Forbes Field, Rawlings had batted before Grimm was called out. Skipper McKechnie notified Klem of his intention to protest the game, but fortunately, the Bucs precluded this move by winning in the interesting way.'
$Miller was hit in the head and carried to the clubhouse
Aldridge ejected by Ump McCormick for protesting a called ball by slamming his glove down on the ground.  Dumovich replaced him with a count of 3-2.
$BOUNCE HR
$With a count of 1-2 to Fournier, Ump Quigley halted the game due to the rain.  Play was resumed 23 minutes later.
Attempted SH was popped up. Grimm trapped it and threw to 1B for the 1st out. Rapp had returned to 1B so Rawlings tagged him out.  Rapp ejected for disputing the play at 1B.
$Gooch was struck on the throwing hand by Boeckel's bat, bruising a finger.

$Lined off Donohue and caromed to deep SS. Donohue injured his hand. The wound between his 4th and 5th fingers was cut so deeply it had to be sewed. He will likely be unable to pitch for at least a week.
$Traynor was spiked by Roush at 3B
$Hargrave was hurt sliding into 2B
$BOUNCE HR

During Rawlings' AB, O'Neil was ejected by Ump Pfirman for disputing decisions on pitched balls and throwing his glove. According to the reporter, Pfirman had started to call a strike on Rawlings, and after half-raising his right arm, he decided it was a ball. Earlier in the game, Pfirman ejected Dick Rudolph.
$Rain delay of 5 minutes.

$On 7/28/23, the Gazette reported an incident that happened here: 'Not many fans were aware that Lee Meadows was ordered out of (the) game following the balk charged against the spectacled hurler.  Lee became incensed over the ruling and in the general excitement he lost his head.  The umpires had already ordered him out of the game when Maranville chimed in. 'He was talking to me', yelled Rabbit, and Meadows was allowed to stay.'
$Rain delay of 17 minutes
$Curve ball hit him in the back of the neck
$Schmidt's hand was hurt on a foul tip
$Rain started at this point
$Game called on account of rain.
Osborne was ejected from the bench by Ump Klem for criticizing his decision.
On his way from the coacher's box to the dugout, Alexander said something to Ump Klem and he was ejected.
$Off Barnes' leg; he was hurt and left game
$BOUNCE HR
$During Morrison's AB, Henline was struck on the bare hand with a foul tip and left the game.
